# widget

**Type Property**

The container background placement for a widget.

## Declaration

```swift
static let widget: ContainerBackgroundPlacement
```

## Discussion

Pass the container background placement to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/containerBackground(_:for:)] function to configure the background of your widgets.

## Getting placements

- **navigation**: A background placement inside a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationStack] or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationSplitView].
- **tabView**: A background placement inside a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView].
